segments.text: Well , What seems to be the trouble , Mr . Williams ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's nothing serious actually , doctor . It â€™ s ... Well , I get tired very easily recently , and I often doze off during meetings , office hours and sometimes even while I'm dining .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long has this been going on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: About two months . I didn't pay much attention to it in the beginning , but you see , I got fired this morning . I dozed off while we were having an important meeting , right in front of the boss . I was very embarrassed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You haven't lost any weight , have you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , doctor . I've actually put on two pounds .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll have to have some laboratory examinations to know for sure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A blood test and during test . You can come back next week , say 4 pm to see the results .
segments.speaker: S2
